alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:41PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 430 PM MST... At 340 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sells, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, Ali Chukson, Gu Oidak, Cowlic, No:ligk, Cababi, San Luis - Sells District, Artesia, Rincon, Kupk and Ali Molina. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 100 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
